Text: Organization AnnouncementFpst Organization Announcement It is my pleasure to announce that Kenneth Lovejoy has joined Enron Corp EHS Asset Operations He will be reporting directly to Donnie Willmann and will support Central America Caribbean and EES Ken has over year experience in environmental health and safety for the oil and gas industry He has been working for Enron since and has extensive international experience We are excited to have Ken in our team so please welcome Ken in his new role Henry Van
